alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 5:08PM PDT until March 13 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 65 mph until sundown. Visibilities locally down to one quarter mile or less in blowing dust and sand. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds and reduced visibility from blowing dust will make driving difficult. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways impacted by strong winds and blowing dust include Highways 14 and 138.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
